OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Yelan's Elemental Skill to move quickly and dodge <color=#FFCC33FF>Giant Pinballs</color>. Pick Adventure Coins up to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Boulder Run</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Gain 1 point when collecting an <color=#FFCC33FF>Adventure Coin</color> during the challenge. Gain 5 points when collecting a <color=#FFCC33FF>Large Adventure Coin</color>. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. The challenge will contain fast-moving <color=#FFCC33FF>Giant Pinballs</color> that, when touched, will send the character(s) flying.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>

2. <color=#FFCC33FF>Elevated Platforms</color> will rise randomly during the challenge. A Plunging Attack on it will knock it back to the ground and drop Adventure Coins.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Verdant Tsunami</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Gain 1 point when collecting an <color=#FFCC33FF>Adventure Coin</color> during the challenge. Gain 5 points when collecting a <color=#FFCC33FF>Large Adventure Coin</color>. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Verdant Tsunami</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Gain 1 point when collecting an <color=#FFCC33FF>Adventure Coin</color> during the challenge. Gain 5 points when collecting a <color=#FFCC33FF>Large Adventure Coin</color>. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Kamisato Ayaka

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Beidou's Elemental Skill to hit the balls for points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction, cannot use Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, and cannot unleash Elemental Bursts.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: A Close Home Run</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Hit a <color=#FFCC33FF>Straight Ball</color> hurtling towards your character to score 1 point, and hit a <color=#FFCC33FF>Curve Ball</color> to score 3 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. After a certain amount of time, the difficulty of batting will increase, but the points you score will also double.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Beidou

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Yun Jin's Elemental Skill to hit the balls for points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction, cannot use Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, and cannot unleash Elemental Bursts.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: A Close Home Run</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Hit a <color=#FFCC33FF>Straight Ball</color> hurtling towards your character to score 1 point, and hit a <color=#FFCC33FF>Curve Ball</color> to score 3 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. After a certain amount of time, the difficulty of batting will increase, but the points you score will also double.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Yun Jin

OGHIHPCCIHM: Knock the Slimes into the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goals</color> by triggering the Overloaded reaction with Yanfei's and Klee's attacks to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members cannot use their Elemental Bursts.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Superfast Hat Trick</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. During the challenge, knock an Electro Slime into any of the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goals</color> to score 1 point. Knock a Large Electro Slime into a goal to score 5 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. During the challenge, the Electro Slimes and the Large Electro Slimes will not attack nor die and will continuously affect themselves with Electro.
3. During the challenge, there are moving walls that Electro Slimes and Large Electro Slimes can bounce off of.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Characters</color> 
Klee and Yanfei

OGHIHPCCIHM: Knock the Slimes into the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goals</color> by using Jean's Elemental Skill to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction and cannot use their Elemental Bursts.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Superfast Hat Trick</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. During the challenge, knock a Pyro Slime into any of the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goals</color> to gain 1 point. Knock a Large Pyro Slime into the goal to gain 5 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. During the challenge, the Pyro Slimes and the Large Pyro Slimes will not attack nor die and will continuously affect themselves with Pyro.
3. During the challenge, there are moving walls that Pyro Slimes and Large Pyro Slimes can bounce off of.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Jean

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Razor's attacks to break the <color=#FFCC33FF>Explosive Rocks</color> to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will constantly recover Elemental Energy.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Smash 'n' Bash</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Attack the <color=#FFCC33FF>Explosive Rocks</color> to smash them and score points. You score 1 point for smashing normal Explosive Rocks, and 3 points for smashing Explosive Rocks with special effects. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. Destroying Transverse Explosive Rocks will also blow up a whole row of rocks.
3. Destroying Big Explosive Rocks will also destroy all the rocks on the field.
4. Destroying Mighty Rocks will give all party members an increased ability to smash Explosive Rocks and restore their Stamina for a short duration.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Razor

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Noelle's attacks to break the <color=#FFCC33FF>Explosive Rocks</color> to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will constantly recover Elemental Energy.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Smash 'n' Bash</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. Attack the <color=#FFCC33FF>Explosive Rocks</color> to smash them and score points. You score 1 point for smashing normal Explosive Rocks, and 3 points for smashing Explosive Rocks with special effects. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. Destroying Transverse Explosive Rocks will also blow up a whole row of rocks.
3. Destroying Big Explosive Rocks will also destroy all the rocks on the field.
4. Destroying Mighty Rocks will give all party members an increased ability to smash Explosive Rocks and restore their Stamina for a short duration.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color>
Noelle

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Kazuha's Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst to break the enemies' shields and directly defeat the enemies.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction and will constantly regenerate HP.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Shieldbreaker</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target number of enemies are defeated.
2. During the challenge, the enemies <color=#FFCC33FF>will immediately be defeated when their shields are broken</color>.

Kaedehara Kazuha

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Sucrose's Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst to break the enemy's shields and directly defeat the enemy.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction and will constantly regenerate HP.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Shieldbreaker</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>

Sucrose

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Nahida's and Keqing's Normal Attacks to trigger <color=#FFCC33FF>Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread</color> reactions in a short period of time to summon Thunderbolts that will defeat the enemies. When the number of reactions triggered increases, the Thunderbolts may become Super Thunderbolts, increasing their DMG and AoE.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will continue to regenerate HP.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Thunderlit Battlefield</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target number of enemies are defeated.
2. The Physical and all Elemental RES of enemies in challenges have been increased.
3. When the <color=#FFCC33FF>Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread</color> reactions are triggered on opponents continuously in a short period of time, Thunderbolts will fall, dealing Electro DMG to enemies. As the number of reactions triggered increases, the Thunderbolts may become Super Thunderbolts, increasing the Electro DMG they deal and their AoE.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Characters</color> 
Nahida and Keqing

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Yae Miko's and Sangonomiya Kokomi's attacks to trigger <color=#FFCC33FF>Electro-Charged</color> reactions in a short period of time to summon Thunderbolts that will defeat the enemy. DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Thunderlit Battlefield</color>

3. When the <color=#FFCC33FF>Electro-Charged</color> reaction is triggered on opponents continuously in a short period of time, Thunderbolts will fall, dealing Electro DMG to enemies. As the number of reactions triggered increases, the Thunderbolts may become Super Thunderbolts, increasing the Electro DMG they deal and their AoE.

3. When a character keeps hitting enemies with <color=#FFCC33FF>Normal Attacks</color> in a short period of time, Shockwaves will be released to deal a lot of DMG to enemies. When the number of hits increases, the Shockwaves may become Super Shockwaves, increasing the DMG they deal and their AoE.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Trial Character</color> 
Kamisato Ayato

OGHIHPCCIHM: Use Alhaitham's Elemental Skill to move rapidly while carefully avoiding the cracked floors and collecting Adventure Coins.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Foothold Hunt</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. During the challenge, collect <color=#FFCC33FF>Adventure Coins</color> to score 1 point, and collect <color=#FFCC33FF>Large Adventure Coins</color> to score 5 points. Reach the target score to complete the challenge.
2. The <color=#FFCC33FF>Floating Tiles</color> will collapse rapidly upon being stepped on.
3. Use the portal at the bottom to quickly return to the top.

All party members will gain a cooldown reduction.

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Aerial Dodgeball</color>

OGHIHPCCIHM: Knock the Slimes into the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goal</color> by using Shikanoin Heizou's <color=#FFCC33FF>Charged Attack or Elemental Skill</color> to score points.\nDuring the challenge, all party members will be unable to use Elemental Bursts and will receive a cooldown reduction.
DLKEKNHNHPH:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge {0}: Superfast Hat Trick</color>

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Challenge Rules</color>
1. During the challenge, knock a Pyro Slime into any of the <color=#FFCC33FF>Vine Goals</color> to gain 1 point. Knock a Large Pyro Slime into the goal to gain 5 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
2. During the challenge, the Pyro Slimes and the Large Pyro Slimes will not attack nor die and will continuously affect themselves with Pyro.
3. During the challenge, there are moving walls that Pyro Slimes and Large Pyro Slimes can bounce off of.
